10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.Desc: Has a very high chance for a critical hit. Can only be activated by Pikachu wearing a cap holding the item Pikashunium Z and knowing the move Thunderbolt.

Absorb.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Bloom Doom Base Power: 100

Accelerock.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +1. Continental Crush Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Acid.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Acid Armor.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Acid Downpour.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Poisonium Z and having a Poison-type attacking move.

Acid Spray.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Acrobatics.Desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 100

Acupressure.Desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute. Z-Power Effect: Raises critical hit ratio by 2 stages.

Aerial Ace.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Aeroblast.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 180

After You.Desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises user's Speed by 1 stage.

Agility.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Air Cutter.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Air Slash.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 140

All-Out Pummeling.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Fightinium Z and having a Fighting-type attacking move.

Ally Switch.Desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 2 stages.

Amnesia.Desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Anchor Shot.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 160

Ancient Power.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage. Continental Crush Base Power: 120

Aqua Jet.Desc: Priority +1. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Aqua Ring.Desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Aqua Tail.Desc: No additional effect. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 175

Arm Thrust.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100

Aromatherapy.Desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Aromatic Mist.Desc: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user. Z-Power Effect: Raises user's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Assist.Desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Bounce, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or any Z-Move. Z-Power Effect: Will turn selected move into its respective Z-Move.

Assurance.Desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split. Self-inflicted damage, including that from Life Orb, recoil-inducing attacks, or confusion, count as the target having taken damage. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 120

Astonish.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 100

Attack Order.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 175

Attract.Desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Aura Sphere.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 160

Aurora Beam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 120

Aurora Veil.Desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Hail. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Autotomize.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100 kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1 kg. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Avalanche.Desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn. Priority -4. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 120

Baby-Doll Eyes.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. Priority +1. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Baneful Bunker.Desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Barrage.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Barrier.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Baton Pass.Desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Beak Blast.Desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 180

Beat Up.Desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 100

Belch.Desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one. Acid Downpour Base Power: 190

Belly Drum.Desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP, then halves maximum HP and raises Attack by 12 stages.

Bestow.Desc: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item. Z-Power Effect: Raises user's Speed by 2 stages.

Bide.Desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity. Priority +1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Bind.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Bite.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 120

Black Hole Eclipse.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Darkinium Z and having a Dark-type attacking move.

Blast Burn.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 200

Blaze Kick.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 160

Blizzard.Desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 185

Block.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Bloom Doom.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Grassium Z and having a Grass-type attacking move.

Blue Flare.Desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 195

Body Slam.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Bolt Strike.Desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 195

Bone Club.Desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 120

Bone Rush.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 100

Bonemerang.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 100

Boomburst.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches.  Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 200

Bounce.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. 30% chance to paralyze the target. Sky Uppercut and attacks from a Pokemon that either carries No Guard or has used Lock-On or Mind Reader will still land. A few other attacks will land regardless of the user's in-air status—Gust, Thunder, Twister, Sky Uppercut, Hurricane, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Toxic used by a Poison-type. Cannot be used while Gravity is active. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 160

Brave Bird.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 190

Breakneck Blitz.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Normalium Z and having a Normal-type attacking move.

Brick Break.Desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 140

Brine.Desc: Power doubles if the target has less than or equal to half of its maximum HP remaining. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 120

Brutal Swing.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 120

Bubble.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100

Bubble Beam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 120

Bug Bite.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 120

Bug Buzz.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 175

Bulk Up.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Bulldoze.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Power is halved during Grassy Terrain if the target is grounded. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 120

Bullet Punch.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +1. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Bullet Seed.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Bloom Doom Base Power: 100

Burn Up.Desc: Fails unless the user is a Fire type. If this move is successful, the user's Fire type becomes typeless as long as it remains active. If the user has no typing aside from Fire, it will become typeless. Fails if the user is no longer a Fire type. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 195

Calm Mind.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Camouflage.Desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type. Z-Power Effect: Raises evasion by 1 stage.

Captivate.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 2 stages.

Catastropika.Desc: No additional effect. Can only be activated by Pikachu holding the item Pikanium Z and knowing the move Volt Tackle.

Celebrate.Desc: No competitive use. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Charge.Desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Charge Beam.Desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 100

Charm.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Chatter.Desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Chip Away.Desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Circle Throw.Desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target is under the effect of Ingrain, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute. Priority -6. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120. Z-Move does not have negative priority.

Clamp.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100

Clanging Scales.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. Devastating Drake Base Power: 185

Clangorous Soulblaze.Desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Can only be activated by Kommo-o holding the item Kommonium Z and knowing the move Clanging Scales.

Clear Smog.Desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Close Combat.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 190

Coil.Desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Comet Punch.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Confide.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Confuse Ray.Desc: Causes the target to become confused. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Confusion.Desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 100

Constrict.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Continental Crush.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Rockium Z and having a Rock-type attacking move.

Conversion.Desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Conversion 2.Desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Copycat.Desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or any Z-Move. Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Core Enforcer.Desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, or Stance Change, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Devastating Drake Base Power: 140

Corkscrew Crash.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Steelium Z and having a Steel-type attacking move.

Cosmic Power.Desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Cotton Guard.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Cotton Spore.Desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Counter.Desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have negative priority.

Covet.Desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Crabhammer.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 180

Crafty Shield.Desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Cross Chop.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 180

Cross Poison.Desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. 10% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 140

Crunch.Desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Crush Claw.Desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Crush Grip.Desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

Curse.Desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected. Z-Power Effect for Ghost-types: Fully restores HP, then halves HP and inflicts a Curse on the opponent. Z-Power Effect for all other types: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Cut.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Dark Pulse.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Dark Void.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Darkrai. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Darkest Lariat.Desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Dazzling Gleam.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 160

Defend Order.Desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Defense Curl.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable). Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Defog.Desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Destiny Bond.Desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability. Z-Power Effect: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user.

Detect.Desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises evasion by 1 stage.

Devastating Drake.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Dragonium Z and having a Dragon-type attacking move.

Diamond Storm.Desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Continental Crush Base Power: 180

Dig.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. If targeted by Earthquake or Magnitude while underground, the attack will deal double its normal damage. Attacks from a Pokemon with No Guard or one that used either Lock-On or Mind Reader previously will still land. If Toxic is used by a Poison-type, it will land regardless of the user's underground status. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 160

Disable.Desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Disarming Voice.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 100

Discharge.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 160

Dive.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. If targeted by Surf or Whirlpool while underwater, the attack will deal double its normal damage. Attacks from a Pokemon with No Guard or one that used either Lock-On or Mind Reader previously will still land. If Toxic is used by a Poison-type, it will land regardless of the user's underwater status. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 160

Dizzy Punch.Desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Doom Desire.Desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 200

Double Hit.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Double Kick.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100

Double Slap.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Double Team.Desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Double-Edge.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

Draco Meteor.Desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages. Devastating Drake Base Power: 195

Dragon Ascent.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 190

Dragon Breath.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Devastating Drake Base Power: 120

Dragon Claw.Desc: No additional effect. Devastating Drake Base Power: 160

Dragon Dance.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Dragon Hammer.Desc: No additional effect. Devastating Drake Base Power: 175

Dragon Pulse.Desc: No additional effect. Devastating Drake Base Power: 160

Dragon Rage.Desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target. Devastating Drake Base Power: 100

Dragon Rush.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. Devastating Drake Base Power: 180

Dragon Tail.Desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute. Priority -6. Devastating Drake Base Power: 120

Drain Punch.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 140

Draining Kiss.Desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 100

Dream Eater.Desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Only works if the target is asleep. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 180

Drill Peck.Desc: No additional effect. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 160

Drill Run.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 160

Dual Chop.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Devastating Drake Base Power: 100

Dynamic Punch.Desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 180

Earth Power.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 175

Earthquake.Desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig. Power is halved during Grassy Terrain if the target is grounded. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 180

Echoed Voice.Desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Eerie Impulse.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Egg Bomb.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 180

Electric Terrain.Desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Electrify.Desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Electro Ball.Desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 160

Electroweb.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 100

Embargo.Desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Ember.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 100

Encore.Desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Copycat, Encore, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or any Z-Move. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Endeavor.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Endure.Desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Energy Ball.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Bloom Doom Base Power: 175

Entrainment.Desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Truant, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, or Zen Mode. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Eruption.Desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 200

Explosion.Desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 200

Extrasensory.Desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 160

Extreme Evoboost.Desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. Can only be activated by Eevee holding the item Eevium Z and knowing the move Last Resort.

Extreme Speed.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +2. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160. Z-Move does not have priority.

Facade.Desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Fairy Lock.Desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Fairy Wind.Desc: No additional effect. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 100

Fake Out.Desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field. Can only be used on the user's first turn out. Priority +3. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Fake Tears.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

False Swipe.Desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Feather Dance.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Feint.Desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. User does not suffer the adverse affects of Spiky Shield and King's Shield. Priority +2. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Feint Attack.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 120

Fell Stinger.Desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 100

Fiery Dance.Desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 160

Final Gambit.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints. Target takes damage equal to the user's HP at the time of use. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 180

Fire Blast.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 185

Fire Fang.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to flinch it. 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 120

Fire Lash.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 160

Fire Pledge.Desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Serene Grace Ability. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 160

Fire Punch.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 140

Fire Spin.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 100

First Impression.Desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field. Priority +2. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 175

Fissure.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 180

Flail.Desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Flame Burst.Desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 140

Flame Charge.Desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 100

Flame Wheel.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws the user. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 120

Flamethrower.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 175

Flare Blitz.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. 10% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 190

Flash.Desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises evasion by 1 stage.

Flash Cannon.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 160

Flatter.Desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Fleur Cannon.Desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 195

Fling.Desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability. Base Power and effect depend on the item. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 100

Floral Healing.Desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Flower Shield.Desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Fly.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Sky Uppercut and attacks from a Pokemon that either carries No Guard or has used Lock-On or Mind Reader will still land. A few other attacks will land regardless of the user's in-air status—Gust, Thunder, Twister, Sky Uppercut, Hurricane, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Toxic used by a Poison-type. Cannot be used while Gravity is active. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 175

Flying Press.Desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 170

Focus Blast.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 190

Focus Energy.Desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally. Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Focus Punch.Desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move. Priority -3. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 200

Follow Me.Desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Force Palm.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120

Foresight.Desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth. Z-Power Effect: Raises critical hit ratio by 2 stages.

Forest's Curse.Desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Foul Play.Desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 175

Freeze Shock.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 200

Freeze-Dry.Desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is. 10% chance to freeze the target. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 140

Frenzy Plant.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move. Bloom Doom Base Power: 200

Frost Breath.Desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 120

Frustration.Desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Fury Attack.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Fury Cutter.Desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 100

Fury Swipes.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Fusion Bolt.Desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 180

Fusion Flare.Desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 180

Future Sight.Desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 190

Gastro Acid.Desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, or Stance Change, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Gear Grind.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 100

Gear Up.Desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Genesis Supernova.Desc: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. Can only be activated by Mew holding the item Mewnium Z and knowing the move Psychic.

Geomancy.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Giga Drain.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Bloom Doom Base Power: 140

Giga Impact.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 200

Gigavolt Havoc.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Electrium Z and having a Electric-type attacking move.

Glaciate.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 120

Glare.Desc: Paralyzes the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Grass Knot.Desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg. Bloom Doom Base Power: 160

Grass Pledge.Desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem. Bloom Doom Base Power: 160

Grass Whistle.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Grassy Terrain.Desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Gravity.Desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Growl.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Growth.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day, raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Grudge.Desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP. Z-Power Effect: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user.

Guard Split.Desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Guard Swap.Desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Guardian of Alola.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. Can only be activated by Tapu Bulu, Tapu Fini, Tapu Koko, and Tapu Lele holding the item Tapunium Z and knowing the move Nature's Madness.'

Guillotine.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 180

Gunk Shot.Desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 190

Gust.Desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 100

Gyro Ball.Desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 160

Hail.Desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Hammer Arm.Desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 180

Happy Hour.Desc: No competitive use. Doubles the prize money received after battle. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Harden.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Haze.Desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Head Charge.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

Head Smash.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Continental Crush Base Power: 200

Headbutt.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Heal Bell.Desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Heal Block.Desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 2 stages.

Heal Order.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Metal Claw.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 100

Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Chatter, Mimic, Sketch, Struggle, Transform, or any Z-Move. This move is prevented from executing and the user does not lose HP if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, or if this move is Fire type and the user is affected by Powder or the weather is Primordial Sea. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 200

The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn. Priority -5. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have negative priority.

Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain. Moonlight.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Morning Sun.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Mud Bomb.Desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 120

Mud Shot.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 100

Mud Sport.Desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Mud-Slap.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 100

Muddy Water.Desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 175

Multi-Attack.Desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 185

Mystical Fire.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 140

Nasty Plot.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Natural Gift.Desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user. Consequently, Natural Gift cannot be used if the user is suffering from the effects of Embargo, Klutz, Magic Room, or Unnerve. The move will fail if the user is not holding a Berry. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Nature Power.Desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain. Z-Power Effect: Will turn selected move into its respective Z-Move.

Nature's Madness.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 100

Needle Arm.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Bloom Doom Base Power: 120

Never-Ending Nightmare.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Ghostium Z and having a Ghost-type attacking move.

Night Daze.Desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Night Shade.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 100

Night Slash.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 140

Nightmare.Desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Noble Roar.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Nuzzle.Desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 100

Oblivion Wing.Desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 160

Oceanic Operetta.Desc: No additional effect. Can only be activated by Primarina holding the item Primarium Z and knowing the move Sparkling Aria.

Octazooka.Desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 120

Odor Sleuth.Desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Ominous Wind.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 120

Origin Pulse.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 185

Outrage.Desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user. Devastating Drake Base Power: 190

Overheat.Desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 195

Pain Split.Desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Parabolic Charge.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 120

Parting Shot.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP of Pokemon chosen to replace the user.

Pay Day.Desc: No competitive effect. Scatters coins to be picked up after Trainer battles equal to 5x the user's level for each use. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Payback.Desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 100

Peck.Desc: No additional effect. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 100

Perish Song.Desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Petal Blizzard.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Bloom Doom Base Power: 175

Petal Dance.Desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Phantom Force.Desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 175

Photon Geyser.Desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 180

Pin Missile.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 140

Plasma Fists.Desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 180

Play Nice.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Play Rough.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage. Twinkle Tackle Base Power: 175

Pluck.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Pluck cannot consume Jaboca Berries, which will damage the user before it can consume them, and cannot steal Berries from Pokemon with the ability Sticky Hold. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Poison Fang.Desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Poison Gas.Desc: Poisons the target. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Poison Jab.Desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 160

Poison Powder.Desc: Poisons the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Poison Sting.Desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Poison Tail.Desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Pollen Puff.Desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 175

Pound.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Powder.Desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 2 stages.

Powder Snow.Desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 100

Power Gem.Desc: No additional effect. Continental Crush Base Power: 160

Power Split.Desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Power Swap.Desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Power Trick.Desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Power Trip.Desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Power Whip.Desc: No additional effect. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Power-Up Punch.Desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100

Precipice Blades.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 190

Present.Desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Prismatic Laser.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 200

Protect.Desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Psybeam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 120

Psych Up.Desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Psychic.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 175

Psychic Fangs.Desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 160

Psychic Terrain.Desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Psycho Boost.Desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 200

Psycho Cut.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 140

Psycho Shift.Desc: The user's major status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no major status condition or if the target already has one. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 2 stages.

Psyshock.Desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 160. Z-Move deals damage to the target's Special Defense.

Psystrike.Desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 180. Z-Move deals damage to the target's Special Defense.

Psywave.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 100

Pulverizing Pancake.Desc: No additional effect. Can only be activated by Snorlax holding the item Snorlium Z and knowing the move Giga Impact.

Punishment.Desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Purify.Desc: The target is cured if it has a major status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Pursuit.Desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 100

Quash.Desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Quick Attack.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Quick Guard.Desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn.
