This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Quiver Dance.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Rage.Desc: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Rage Powder.Desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats

Rain Dance.Desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Rapid Spin.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Breakneck Blitz from Rapid Spin does not have any secondary effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Razor Leaf.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Bloom Doom Base Power: 100

Razor Shell.Desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 140

Razor Wind.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Recover.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Recycle.Desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 2 stages

Reflect.Desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Reflect Type.Desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, or if the target's current type is typeless alone. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Refresh.Desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Relic Song.Desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Rest.Desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any major status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Retaliate.Desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Return.Desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Revelation Dance.Desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 175

Revenge.Desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120

Reversal.Desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 160

Roar.Desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Roar of Time.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move. Devastating Drake Base Power: 200

Rock Blast.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Continental Crush Base Power: 140

Rock Climb.Desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 175

Rock Polish.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Rock Slide.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Continental Crush Base Power: 140

Rock Smash.Desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100

Rock Throw.Desc: No additional effect. Continental Crush Base Power: 100

Rock Tomb.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Continental Crush Base Power: 120

Rock Wrecker.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move. Continental Crush Base Power: 200

Role Play.Desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Rolling Kick.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120

Rollout.Desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends. Continental Crush Base Power: 100

Roost.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Rototiller.Desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Round.Desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 120

Sacred Fire.Desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 180

Sacred Sword.Desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 175

Safeguard.Desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Sand Attack.Desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises evasion by 1 stage.

Sand Tomb.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 100

Sandstorm.Desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Savage Spin-Out.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Buginium Z and having a Bug-type attacking move.

Scald.Desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 160

Scary Face.Desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Scratch.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Screech.Desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Searing Shot.Desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 180

Searing Sunraze Smash.Desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon. Can only be activated by Solgaleo and Dusk Mane Necrozma holding the item Solganium Z and knowing the move Sunsteel Strike.

Secret Power.Desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain. During a regular link battle or while Electric Terrain is active Secret Power has a chance to paralyze the target, while Psychic Terrain is active Secret Power has a chance to lower the target's Speed by 1, while Grassy Terrain is active Secret Power has a chance to put the target to sleep, and while Misty Terrain is active Secret Power has a chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Secret Sword.Desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 160. Z-Move deals damage to the target's Special Defense.

Seed Bomb.Desc: No additional effect. Bloom Doom Base Power: 160

Seed Flare.Desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Seismic Toss.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100

Self-Destruct.Desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 200

Shadow Ball.Desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 160

Shadow Bone.Desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 160

Shadow Claw.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 140

Shadow Force.Desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 190

Shadow Punch.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 120

Shadow Sneak.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +1. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Sharpen.Desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Shattered Psyche.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Psychium Z and having a Psychic-type attacking move.

Sheer Cold.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune. Subzero Slammer Base Power: 180

Shell Smash.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.

Shell Trap.Desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 200

Shift Gear.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Shock Wave.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 120

Shore Up.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Signal Beam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 140

Silver Wind.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 120

Simple Beam.Desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, or Truant. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Sing.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Sinister Arrow Raid.Desc: No additional effect. Can only be activated by Decidueye holding the item Decidium Z and knowing the move Spirit Shackle.

Sketch.Desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Skill Swap.Desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Illusion, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or Wonder Guard. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Skull Bash.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 195

Sky Attack.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Has a 30% chance to make the foe flinch. Has a high critical hit ratio. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 200

Sky Drop.Desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop. Sky Drop ignores all forms of redirection, including Follow Me, Rage Powder, and Spotlight. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Sky Uppercut.Desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 160

Slack Off.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Slam.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Slash.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Sleep Powder.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Sleep Talk.Desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, any two-turn move, or any Z-Move. Z-Power Effect: Raises critical hit ratio by 2 stages.

Sludge.Desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 120

Sludge Bomb.Desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 175

Sludge Wave.Desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Acid Downpour Base Power: 175

Smack Down.Desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target. Continental Crush Base Power: 100

Smart Strike.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 140

Smelling Salts.Desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 140

Smog.Desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target. Acid Downpour Base Power: 100

Smokescreen.Desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises evasion by 1 stage.

Snarl.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 100

Snatch.Desc: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 2 stages.

Snore.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Soak.Desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Soft-Boiled.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Solar Beam.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. Charge turn is skipped during sun. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Solar Blade.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Sonic Boom.Desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike.Desc: No additional effect. Can only be activated by Marshadow holding the item Marshadium Z and knowing the move Spectral Thief.

Spacial Rend.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Devastating Drake Base Power: 180

Spark.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 120

Sparkling Aria.Desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 175

Spectral Thief.Desc: The target's stat stages greater than 0 are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage. This effect can also bypass Substitute. Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike Base Power: 195. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 175

Speed Swap.Desc: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Spider Web.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Spike Cannon.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Spikes.Desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Spiky Shield.Desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Spirit Shackle.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. Never-Ending Nightmare Base Power: 160

Spit Up.Desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Spite.Desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Splash.Desc: No competitive use. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 3 stages.

Splintered Stormshards.Desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain. Can only be activated by Lycanroc holding the item Lycanium Z and knowing the move Stone Edge.

Spore.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Spotlight.Desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from opponents of the target are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Stealth Rock.Desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Steam Eruption.Desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 185

Steamroller.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 120

Steel Wing.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 140

Sticky Web.Desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Stockpile.Desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Stoked Sparksurfer.Desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target. Can only be activated by Alolan Raichu holding the item Aloraichium Z and knowing the move Thunderbolt.

Stomp.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 120

Stomping Tantrum.Desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows. This does not include the moves Baneful Bunker, Crafty Shield, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Mat Block, Protect, and Spiky Shield. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 140

Stone Edge.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Continental Crush Base Power: 180

Stored Power.Desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 160

Storm Throw.Desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120

Strength.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Strength Sap.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

String Shot.Desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Struggle.Desc: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 1

Struggle Bug.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 100

Stun Spore.Desc: Paralyzes the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Submission.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 160

Substitute.Desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Subzero Slammer.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Icium Z and having a Ice-type attacking move.

Sucker Punch.Desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user. Will only work if the foe chose a damaging move and moves after the user. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 140

Sunny Day.Desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Sunsteel Strike.Desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon. Corkscrew Crash Base Power: 180

Super Fang.Desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Superpower.Desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 190

Supersonic.Desc: Causes the target to become confused. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Supersonic Skystrike.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Flyinium Z and having a Flying-type attacking move.

Surf.Desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 175

Swagger.Desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Swallow.Desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Sweet Kiss.Desc: Causes the target to become confused. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Sweet Scent.Desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Swift.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 120

Switcheroo.Desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 2 stages.

Swords Dance.Desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Synchronoise.Desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 190

Synthesis.Desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Tackle.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Tail Glow.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages. Z-Power Effect: Resets all lowered stats.

Tail Slap.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Tail Whip.Desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Tailwind.Desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises critical hit ratio by 2 stages.

Take Down.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 175

Taunt.Desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Tearful Look.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Techno Blast.Desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

Tectonic Rage.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Groundium Z and having a Ground-type attacking move.

Teeter Dance.Desc: Causes the target to become confused. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Telekinesis.Desc: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows. The target is immune to this move on use if its species is Diglett, Dugtrio, Alolan Diglett, Alolan Dugtrio, Sandygast, Palossand, or Gengar while Mega-Evolved. Mega Gengar cannot be under this effect by any means. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Attack by 1 stage.

Teleport.Desc: Fails when used. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP. Z-Power Effect applies before the move fails. (Allows escape from wild battles.)

Thief.Desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 120

Thousand Arrows.Desc: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 180

Thousand Waves.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Tectonic Rage Base Power: 175

Thrash.Desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

Throat Chop.Desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves. Pokemon behind a Substitute are not affected. Black Hole Eclipse Base Power: 160

Thunder.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 185

Thunder Fang.Desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 120

Thunder Punch.Desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 140

Thunder Shock.Desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 100

Thunder Wave.Desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Thunderbolt.Desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 175

Tickle.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Topsy-Turvy.Desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Torment.Desc: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Toxic.Desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Toxic Spikes.Desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Toxic Thread.Desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Transform.Desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion. Z-Power Effect: Fully restores HP.

Tri Attack.Desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Trick.Desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 2 stages.

Trick Room.Desc: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends. Z-Power Effect: Raises accuracy by 1 stage.

Trick-or-Treat.Desc: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Triple Kick.Desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 120

Trop Kick.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage. Bloom Doom Base Power: 140

Trump Card.Desc: The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Pressure Ability resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Twineedle.Desc: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 100

Twinkle Tackle.Desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power. Can only be activated by holding the item Fairium Z and having a Fairy-type attacking move.

Twister.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Devastating Drake Base Power: 100

U-turn.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 140

Uproar.Desc: The user spends three turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 175

V-create.Desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage. Inferno Overdrive Base Power: 220

Vacuum Wave.Desc: No additional effect. Priority +1. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Venom Drench.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Venoshock.Desc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned. Acid Downpour Base Power: 120

Vice Grip.Desc: No additional effect. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Vine Whip.Desc: No additional effect. Bloom Doom Base Power: 100

Vital Throw.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Priority -1. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 140

Volt Switch.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 140

Volt Tackle.Desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 190

Wake-Up Slap.Desc: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up. All-Out Pummeling Base Power: 140

Water Gun.Desc: No additional effect. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100

Water Pledge.Desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Serene Grace Ability. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Storm Drain Ability. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 160

Water Pulse.Desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 120

Water Shuriken.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is an Ash-Greninja with the Battle Bond Ability, this move has a power of 20 and always hits three times. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100. Z-Move does not have priority.

Water Sport.Desc: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Water Spout.Desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1. Hits both foes in Doubles matches. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 200

Waterfall.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 160

Weather Ball.Desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Hail, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. Becomes Fire-type in sun, Water-type in rain, Rock-type in sand, and Ice-type in hail. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 160

Whirlpool.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Hydro Vortex Base Power: 100

Whirlwind.Desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Wide Guard.Desc: The user and its party members are protected from moves made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Wild Charge.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 175

Will-O-Wisp.Desc: Burns the target. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Wing Attack.Desc: No additional effect. Supersonic Skystrike Base Power: 120

Wish.Desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded half up. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Withdraw.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Defense by 1 stage.

Wonder Room.Desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon have their Defense and Special Defense stats swapped. Stat stage changes are unaffected. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends. Z-Power Effect: Raises Special Defense by 1 stage.

Wood Hammer.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP. Bloom Doom Base Power: 190

Work Up.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. Z-Power Effect: Raises Attack by 1 stage.

Worry Seed.Desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Insomnia, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or Truant. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Wrap.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Wring Out.Desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 190

X-Scissor.Desc: No additional effect. Savage Spin-Out Base Power: 160

Yawn.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a major status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a major status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect. Z-Power Effect: Raises Speed by 1 stage.

Zap Cannon.Desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 190

Zen Headbutt.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Shattered Psyche Base Power: 160

Zing Zap.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Gigavolt Havoc Base Power: 160

Absorb.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

Acid.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Acid Armor.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Acid Spray.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Acrobatics.Desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

Acupressure.Desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.

Aerial Ace.Desc: This move does not check accuracy.

Aeroblast.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

After You.Desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn.

Agility.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Air Cutter.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Air Slash.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

Ally Switch.Desc: The user swaps positions with its ally on the opposite side of the field. Fails if there is no Pokemon at that position, if the user is the only Pokemon on its side, or if the user is in the middle.

Amnesia.Desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.

Ancient Power.Desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

Aqua Ring.Desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect.

Arm Thrust.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Aromatherapy.Desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.

Aromatic Mist.Desc: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

Assist.Desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Belch, Bestow, Bounce, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.

Assurance.Desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.

Astonish.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

Attack Order.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Attract.Desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.

Aura Sphere.Desc: This move does not check accuracy.

Aurora Beam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Autotomize.Desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100 kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1 kg.

Avalanche.Desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.

Baby-Doll Eyes.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. Priority +1.

Barrage.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Barrier.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Baton Pass.Desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.

Beat Up.Desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.

Belch.Desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.

Belly Drum.Desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.

Bestow.Desc: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item.

Bide.Desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity.

Bind.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Bite.Desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

Blast Burn.Desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

Blaze Kick.Desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

Blizzard.Desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Block.Desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

Blue Flare.Desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Body Slam.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

Bolt Strike.Desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

Bone Club.Desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

Bone Rush.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Bonemerang.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Boomburst.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches.

Bounce.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

Brave Bird.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Brick Break.Desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect and Light Screen end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.

Brine.Desc: Power doubles if the target has less than or equal to half of its maximum HP remaining.

Bubble.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Bubble Beam.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Bug Bite.Desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

Bug Buzz.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Bulk Up.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

Bulldoze.Desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches. Power is halved during Grassy Terrain if the target is grounded.

Bullet Seed.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Calm Mind.Desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Camouflage.Desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, and Grass type during Grassy Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.

Captivate.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Charge.Desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.

Charge Beam.Desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Charm.Desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

Chatter.Desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

Chip Away.Desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

Circle Throw.Desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target is under the effect of Ingrain, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.

Clamp.Desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

Clear Smog.Desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

Close Combat.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Coil.Desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.

Comet Punch.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Confide.Desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Confuse Ray.Desc: Causes the target to become confused.

Confusion.Desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Constrict.Desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Conversion.Desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.

Conversion 2.Desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

Copycat.Desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Belch, Bestow, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.

Cosmic Power.Desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Cotton Guard.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.

Cotton Spore.Desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Counter.Desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a power of 1 instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random opposing Pokemon in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.

Covet.Desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

Crabhammer.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Crafty Shield.Desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

Cross Chop.Desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Cross Poison.Desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

Crunch.Desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Crush Claw.Desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Crush Grip.Desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.

Curse.Desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.

Dark Pulse.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

Dark Void.Desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Dazzling Gleam.Desc: No additional effect. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Defend Order.Desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Defense Curl.Desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

Defog.Desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.

Destiny Bond.Desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight.

Detect.Desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

Diamond Storm.Desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Dig.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

Disable.Desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move.

Disarming Voice.Desc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits both foes in Doubles matches.

Discharge.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Hits both foes and ally in Doubles matches.

Dive.Desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

Dizzy Punch.Desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Doom Desire.Desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

Double Hit.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Double Kick.Desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Double Slap.Desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Double Team.Desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

Double-Edge.Desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Draco Meteor.Desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Dragon Ascent.Desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Dragon Breath.Desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Dragon Dance.Desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

Dragon Rage.Desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

Dragon Rush.Desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

Dragon Tail.Desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.

Drain Punch.Desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

Draining Kiss.Desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

Dream Eater.Desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
